'''[[Android (operating system)|Android]]''' is a [[solution stack|software stack]] for '''[[mobile devices]]''' that includes an [[operating system]], [[middleware]] and key [[application software|applications]].<ref name=google_code>{{cite web |url=http://code.google.com/android/ |title=Google Projects for Android |year=2011 |work=code.google.com |publisher=Google Inc |archiveurl=http://www.webcitation.org/5wiw1JXa2 |archivedate=2011-02-23 |accessdate=2011-02-23}}</ref> This page seeks to list and compare hardware devices that are shipped with either Google's Android operating system or its [[OPhone]] derivative from [[China Mobile]].
'''[[Android (operating system)|Android]]''' is a [[solution stack|software stack]] for '''[[mobile devices]]''' that includes an [[operating system]], [[middleware]] and key [[application software|applications]].<ref name=google_code>{{cite web |url=http://code.google.com/android/ |title=Google Projects for Android |year=2011 |work=code.google.com |publisher=Google Inc |archiveurl=http://www.webcitation.org/5wiw1JXa2 |archivedate=2011-02-23 |accessdate=2011-02-23}}</ref> This page seeks to list and compare hardware devices that are shipped with either Google's Android operating system or its [[OPhone]] derivative from [[China Mobile]].
